ENTRY.refkeywords: extinction curve LMC lmc Large Magellanic Cloud model models modeling modelling source
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Extinction curve for the Large Magellanic Cloud

DESC.PARA: This model is the extinction curve for the LMC, as given in Howart, 1983 MNRAS, 203, 301.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
